collection.name: Old lady
collection.openText: She was so talkative before. In the end, loneliness was the only listener.

observe.desc: [{It takes the shape of an old and feeble elderly person. When anyone enters its chamber, the abnormality would talk to that person.}]

specialTipSize.specialTip: After completing the work of a Abnormality other than $0, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased.
When $0's counter reaches zero, black shapes were formed inside the containment room.Under the condition that $0's Qliphoth counter decreases, we decided to call it "solitude".
When solitude was piled up, solitude stuck to the employee who entered the containment room.
Employee #0 is exposed to a continuous White damage until the solitude was chipped off. Until it disappeared, the employee could not do any work.
